ARABIC: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then they will be told, 'This is what you denied.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will then be told: "This is what you had denied."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: whereafter they will be told: “This is what you used to give the lie to.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and who will be told, "This is what you had called a lie".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It will then be said, “This is what you used to deny.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, it will be said to them: "This is what you used to deny!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then shall it be said: This is what you gave the lie to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then it shall be said to them, 'This is that you cried lies to.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And it will be said (unto them): This is that which ye used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they will be told, "This is what you were wont to belie."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then it will be said: 'this is that which ye were wont to belie.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then told, ‘This is what you used to deny!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Further, it will be said to them: "This is the (reality) which ye rejected as false!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, it will be said to them: "This is what you used to deny!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and it will be said to them: 'This is that which you belied'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then it will be said, “This is what you used to deny.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:17] then it will be said, to them: ‘This, that is, the chastisement, is that which you used to deny!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And it will be said (unto them)) the keepers of hell will say to them when they enter it: (This is that which ye used to deny) this is the chastisement which you used to claim it will never happen.
